pages.text: This butterfly can only be found in the $(#009480)end highlands$(). In nature, this type of butterfly will teleport out of your net once if you try to catch it. A player can lure the enderfly towards them using $(#009480)chorus flowers$(). When put into a bottle, the enderfly will make players who come near them $(#009480)teleport away$(). The wings of the enderfly can be used like $(#009480)enderpearls.$()
pages.title: Enderfly
